explains: n. （故意的）拆毁，毁坏；<非正式>大败

sentences.en: The house was rescued from demolition.
sentences.cn: 这所房子保住了，可以不拆。

sentences.en: The houses were first slated for demolition five years ago.
sentences.cn: 这些房子在五年前就确定要拆除了。

sentences.en: The project required the total demolition of the old bridge.
sentences.cn: 这项工程要求那座旧桥的彻底拆除。
